title: Touchscreen doesn’t work don’t buy
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: I bought this refurbished iPhone for my son for Christmas and it has not worked properly since January. The touchscreen feature that you need to unlock the phone does not work. You used to be able to hard boot it, then the touchscreen would work but now that doesn’t even work. I’ve contacted the seller twice and have not heard back from them. Waste of $200. Don’t use this seller.
author: Jesma Greenstein
Split_4: I’ve contacted the seller twice and have not heard back from them.

title: Not worth it
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: I got the phone and it battery life was already at 80% so it was not refurbished
author: Fidel
